meanings.type: Suffix
meanings.meaning: 1. including ...; inclusive of ... それは朝食込みの値段ですか。Does that price include breakfast?

meanings.type: Noun
meanings.meaning: 2. bundling together (items of different size, quality, etc.); lumping together

meanings.type: Noun
meanings.meaning: 3. komi; extra points given to the white player as compensation for playing second Go (game), Usually written using kana alone, Abbreviation, See also コミ出し, usu. written as コミ

sentences.translation: Does that price include breakfast?

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to be crowded; to be packed; to be congested; to be thronged (with) See also 混む, usu. 混む今晩は列車がとても込んでいる。The train is very crowded this evening.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to be complex; to be intricate See also 手の込んだ

meanings.type: Suffix

meanings.meaning: 5. to do thoroughly; to do sufficiently after -masu stem of verb

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to load (a gun, etc.); to charge 彼はこの銃に弾丸を込めたままにしている。He keeps this gun loaded.

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to put into (e.g. emotion, effort) 彼女のテクニックはすばらしいが、もっと感情を込めて演奏する必要がある。Her technique is superb, but she needs to play with more expression.

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to include (e.g. tax in a sales price) 新憲法には、王権を弱める意図が込められていました。The new constitution included the aim of abridging the king's power.

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to hang over; to shroud; to enshroud; to envelop; to screen See also 立ち込める

meanings.type: Other forms
meanings.meaning: 籠める 【こめる】、篭める 【こめる】、罩める 【こめる】

meanings.type: Notes
meanings.meaning: 罩める: Out-dated kanji or kanji usage.

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to load (a gun, etc.); to charge 彼はこの銃に弾丸を込めたままにしている。He keeps this gun loaded.

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to put into (e.g. emotion, effort) 彼女のテクニックはすばらしいが、もっと感情を込めて演奏する必要がある。Her technique is superb, but she needs to play with more expression.

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to include (e.g. tax in a sales price) 新憲法には、王権を弱める意図が込められていました。The new constitution included the aim of abridging the king's power.

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to hang over; to shroud; to enshroud; to envelop; to screen See also 立ち込める

Her technique is superb, but she needs to play with more expression.
The new constitution included the aim of abridging the king's power.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to jump in; to leap in; to plunge into; to dive

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to burst in; to barge in

meanings.type: Other forms
meanings.meaning: 飛びこむ 【とびこむ】、飛込む 【とびこむ】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to thrust (something) into (something); to cram; to stuff; to shove １人少年が両手をポケットにつっこんで歩いていた。A boy was walking with his hands in his pockets.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to plunge into; to charge into; to rush into; to ram into; to crash into 私たちはそのまま洞窟の口にボートで突っ込んで行きました。We plunged into the cave opening on our boat and continued on.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to delve into (a matter); to go into depth; to get to the heart (of something) 彼は古代史の分野で突っ込んだ研究をしている。He's doing in-depth research on ancient history.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to press (someone) about; to point out (e.g. an inconsistency); to question sharply; to grill

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to get involved with; to meddle in; to poke one's nose into See also 首を突っ込む人の問題に鼻を突っ込むのはよしてくれよ。Stop sticking your nose into other people's business.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to riposte; to retort; to quip

meanings.type: Other forms
meanings.meaning: 突っこむ 【つっこむ】、突込む 【つっこむ】、ツッコむ

sentences.translation: A boy was walking with his hands in his pockets.
We plunged into the cave opening on our boat and continued on.
He's doing in-depth research on ancient history.
Stop sticking your nose into other people's business.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to feel down; to feel sad; to be depressed; to be in low spirits ちょっとしたことで直ぐに落ち込んでしまいます。I get depressed by the slightest things.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to be in a slump (business, economy, etc.); to be in an unfavourable condition １年前に比べれば価格は大きく落ち込んでいる。Compared with the level of a year ago, the price is sharply lower.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to fall into (e.g. a hole)

meanings.type: Other forms

Compared with the level of a year ago, the price is sharply lower.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to drive in (a nail, stake, etc.); to hammer in 板にくぎを打ち込んだ。He hammered nails into the plank.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to hit (a ball, etc.); to drive; to smash

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to fire into; to shoot into also written as 撃ち込む

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to input (data); to enter ノートパソコンの電源を入れ、ブラウザを立ち上げて、もう覚えてしまったアドレスを打ち込む。I switch on my laptop, start up the browser, and type in the address I've already learnt by heart.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to devote oneself to; to be absorbed in; to be (really) into; to be enthusiastic about; to put heart and soul into; to throw oneself into; to go head over heels for 彼はその仕事に打ち込んだ。He applied himself to the task.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to practice hitting (baseball, tennis, etc.) Sports

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to hit (an opponent in kendo, boxing, etc.); to get a blow in Martial arts

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to invade one's opponent's territory; to place a stone in an opponent's formation Go (game)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to pour (concrete, etc.) into a form

sentences.translation: He hammered nails into the plank.
I switch on my laptop, start up the browser, and type in the address I've already learnt by heart.
He applied himself to the task.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to herd; to drive; to chase; to corral

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to corner; to force someone into doing とうとう土壇場に追い込まれた。We have been completely cornered.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to go hard; to push yourself; to make a last charge 僕は追い込まれると一番仕事をする。I work best under pressure.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to run on (e.g. lines in printing)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to have two strikes Baseball

sentences.translation: We have been completely cornered.
I work best under pressure.

meanings.meaning: 1. to push into; to cram into; to stuff into; to crowd into ピストルを持った男が彼をせきたてて車に押し込んだ。A man with a gun urged him into the car.

meanings.meaning: 1. to be enthusiastic (about); to be eager (to do); to be keen; to be intent (on); to be determined

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to board; to embark on; to get into (a car); to man (a ship); to help (someone) into その子は上機嫌で飛行機に乗り込んだ。The child got on an airplane in good mood.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to march into; to enter 一人で原始林へ乗り込もうとは君はなんて勇ましいんだ。How brave of you to go alone into the primaeval forest!

meanings.type: Other forms

How brave of you to go alone into the primaeval forest!

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to swallow; to gulp down 洪水がその村を飲み込んでしまった。The flood overwhelmed the village.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to understand; to grasp; to take in; to catch on; to learn こつが飲み込めましたか。Got the hang of it?

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to engulf; to swallow up

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to be filled with (people); to contain

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to swallow (one's words); to suppress (a yawn, tears, etc.); to stifle; to hold back

meanings.type: Other forms
